attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the system instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the system instance.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the system, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: licenseType
attributes.description: Type of the installed license file.

attributes.name: internalModel
attributes.description: Internal model name for the system.

attributes.name: macAddress
attributes.description: MAC address of the management interface.

attributes.name: isEULAAccepted
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the End User License Agreement (EULA) was accepted for an upgrade. Once the EULA is accepted, users can upload product licenses and configure the system, or both. Values are:
  • true - EULA was accepted on the system. Once you set this value, you cannot set it to false later on.
  • false - EULA was not accepted on the system.

attributes.name: isUpgradeComplete
attributes.description:
Indicates whether an upgrade completed. Operations that change the configuration of the system are not allowed while an upgrade is in progress.

Values are:

  • true - Upgrade completed.
  • false - Upgrade did not complete.

attributes.name: isAutoFailbackEnabled
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the automatic failback of NAS servers is enabled for the system. Values are:
  • true - Automatic failback for NAS servers is enabled.
  • false - Automatic failback for NAS servers is disabled.

attributes.name: currentPower
attributes.description: Current amount of power used by the system.

attributes.name: avgPower
attributes.description: Average amount of power used by the system. The system uses a one hour window of 30-second samples to determine this value.
